objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced Manual Controls
• Full HD 1080p Video
• Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera body with premium build quality
• Advanced 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-precision electronic viewfinder with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Fast autofocus system with 77 selectable AF points
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability at 60fps
• Advanced manual controls with dedicated dials for shutter speed, exposure compensation, and drive modes
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens system
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Film simulation modes that recreate classic Fujifilm styles
• Durable metal top and bottom plates for long-lasting performance

banner_details:
The banner features a sleek modern layout split into four quadrants with a tech-inspired grid overlay. A prominent product image is situated in the top-right quadrant. The top-left includes a bold, two-line headline (`heading`) in white, followed by a vibrant red subheading (`tagline`) conveying excitement. Below, product highlights (`description`) are displayed as bullet points, while the price (`price`) is large, clean, and bold in white. The bottom-right quadrant contains a red CTA button (`cta_background`) with a white label (`cta`) and a message below (`subheading`). The overall theme is professional and energetic, enhanced with diagonal and circular graphic accents.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: `#1A1A1A`
- Charcoal Grey: `#2A2A2A`, `#2D2D2D`, `#121212`
- Crimson Red: `#E63946`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 camera uses a sleek and modern color palette dominated by deep blacks and subtle metallic grays, which convey a sense of professionalism and precision. Accents of white and red on dials and labels stand out for easy readability, while silver highlights on the lens rings add contrast and depth. The lens glass subtly reflects shades of soft green and yellow, adding a touch of vibrancy and modern appeal. These colors blend smoothly, yet each is sharply defined, enhancing the product’s premium feel. Suggested hex codes: Black (#1A1A1A), Silver (#C0C0C0), White (#FFFFFF), Red (#E53935), Greenish Teal (#A0C4B8).
